name: Passwortpranger
description: Eine Webplatform, um Firmen die unsorgfältig mit Passwörtern umgehen an den virtuellen Pranger zu stellen.

AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: Your Amazon AWS access key for S3.

AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: Your Amazon AWS secret key for S3.

ALLOWED_HOSTS.description: A comma separated list of hostnames with which the app can be accessed.

scripts.postdeploy: cd pranger && python manage.py migrate --noinput && python manage.py compress
